data.name: Before The Storm Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Music by Nicholas Zhang. Length: 25 minutes

Gameplay Music:
1. Base
2. Boat
3. Cave
4. Indoor
5. Jungle
6. Before The Storm

Cutscenes Music:

8. We Would Suffer Too
9. Invincible
10.The Possibilities Are Endless
11. Blind As A Bat
12. What Did You Do
13. Busted, Bust out, Chase
14. An Artisan
15. No Laws, No Borders
16. We Shared, And Then Some
